description: Students study topics related to the environment. Topics vary from year to year at the discretion of the instructor. Topics may include Environment and Theology, Environmental Justice, and Ecotourism. Class is largely discussion-based but may include a lab/field work component depending on the topic. May be repeated if topics are different. Offered annually.
name: Top:Cultural Ecol:1st Nat
notes: First-Year Students may register only with permission of instructor.
title: Topics in Environmental Studies
